user_profile.name: Michael Carter
user_profile.description: Michael, a 42-year-old office worker from the Midwest, has a novice level of tech experience but prefers to engage with technology in a technical way. With a reserved personality and cautious decision-making style, he is moderately expressive and tends to communicate directly. Michael is motivated to find cognitive exercises for dementia prevention, as he believes in the importance of mental health and is eager to improve his own cognitive resilience despite often feeling impatient and resistant to change.

task_profile.task: find cognitive exercises for dementia prevention

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

Weekly sessions with a friend or family member for engagement
Solo activities at home to stimulate cognitive functions
